page.title: 19LIVING IN BRIDGE IN 1985
page.content:
I live in Bridge it is surrounded by farmland ,I like it because it's countryside. I like playing in the fields. If you stand on my bed you can see Mr Mummery's farm . It is fun to play sledging down{Mr Mummery's}hill in the winter .Sometimes I go up to Mr Mummery's farm to get potatoes for my Mum to cook for dinner .Mr Mummery sometimes lets me see and pat his animals. He has cows,sheep,and pigs and two donkeys I like farms.
The old railway is now dismantled . The cubs go up there we like to go in the mud.We play in the tunnel.It was used for a big gun in the second world war.It fired 21 miles and when it fired it shattered the windows in Bridge .There is a {legend}that there is a ghost in the tunnel but I have never seen it.
